我的彩虹故事

My Rainbow Story

我的机构叫什么呢

What is the name of my organization?

彩虹天协会

Rainbow Sky Association.

是泰国惟一合法注册的一个同性恋的机构

It is the only gay institute legitimately registered in Thailand.

我们能够注册

Our registration

是要经过一番很漫长的斗争

was a hard won success.

人有很多性别

People come in many genders.

有男 有女 有男同性恋 有女同性恋

There are men, women, gays, lesbians,

还有跨性的人

as well as transgender.

跨性的 男的可以 女的也可以

Both men and women can be transgender.

还有很多很多……

And there are many more.

就好像天空的彩虹一样有七颜六色

As many as there are colors in the rainbow.

你想想看

If you think about it.

今年2005年是联合国成立60周年

Year 2005 is the 60th anniversary of the founding of the UN.

那么六十年前吧

60 years ago,

就已经提出“人权”这两个字了

“human rights” began being mentioned

那么西方国家 人们都已经引起了共识

and then became common consciousness in the western mind.

那么后来才慢慢到东方国家

……
